data.title: Adam Cheng praises daughter for succeeding on her own
data.meta_description: The singer apologises to Joyce Cheng for not being much help to her during her early years in showbiz
data.text:
31 May - Singer Adam Cheng moved many recently when he apologised to his daughter for not being supportive enough with her showbiz career.

As reported on Epoch Times, the singer recently held his concert, "Adam Cheng Half Century, Great Era" and invited his daughter Joyce Cheng to perform with him.

After performing the song "Sai Bat Dai Tau" together, the father and daughter kissed each other on the cheek, with Joyce saying, "Congratulations of your half a century anniversary, daddy. Thank you for inviting me to share with you on your happiest day!"

Adam also thanked Joyce for cancelling all her other plans just to perform with him.

The singer then surprised Joyce to tears when he expressed how embarrassed he is for not helping her in her showbiz career.

"For years since you joined showbiz, I never helped you with it. The success that you have today is through your own struggle. I am proud of you," he said.

Adam then turned to the audience and promoted Joyce's new movie.

According to past reports, after Adam and Lydia Shum were divorced, Joyce rarely contacted her father in order not to disturb Adam's new married life with Koon Jing-wah and their two other children.

While she did inherit Lydia's wealth of HKD 60 million after the latter's passing back when she was 21, Joyce had to work hard on her own since it was stipulated that the money can only be used after she turns 35.

In a previous interview, Joyce also revealed that there was a time when she only had HKD 26 in her account. However, she stressed that she would always try to improve her life on her own rather than ask her father for help.

On the other hand, Joyce recently shared a photo of herself still in her concert dress celebrating her 30th birthday at the event.

She wrote online, "Wishing for perky tits, Michelle Obama arms, Khloe Kardashian's butt and Kim Kardashian's bank. Just kidding... (not really). My 29+1, my wish is simple, I just want everyone in my life to be healthy and happy."

(Photo Source: Mingpao.com)
